nodes.text: Toh Revo Chryyx was a male Cerean grifter. He was wanted by Rokko the Hutt, who placed a bounty of fifteen thousand credits on the Cerean, alive only. Jax Pavan tracked him down for the Hutt in 19 BBY, but the Cerean committed suicide before he could be brought to the Hutt for interrogation and torture.
